Name: Penguin Quest
About the game: Penguin quest A bright platformer about a little penguin on a journey. Collect valuable coins and delicious apples on your way to collect as many points as possible. Skillfully jump over spikes and abysses and dodge snowballs that will be thrown at you by cunning snowmen. Only the most agile and hardcore player will make it to the final level. Do you have enough courage to beat this game? Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack
